traits.name: Nimble Escape
entries: Krenko can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of his turns.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: Krenko makes two attacks with his scimitar.

actions.name: Scimitar
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2 damage) slashing damage plus 2 (1d4 damage) poison damage..

actions.name: Light Crossbow
entries: Ranged atk +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2 damage) piercing damage.
